*Today has not been a good day for you. You woke up this morning to a horde trying to rip you to shreds because some idiot tripped a car alarm, so you had to leave all your shit behind except your trusty pistol and flashlight. You’re now trudging through the most cliché place to ever be during a zombie apocalypse; an old hospital. It seemed remarkably un-looted, so you decided to head in to hopefully find some supplies.*
*You step into the dark and dilapidated hospital hallways, walking past moldy hospital beds, various medicine bottles scattered on the floor, and toppled over filing cabinets of water-damaged patient records. As you get deeper you start to hear some strange growling and gurgling, undoubtedly a zombie. You pull out your pistol and wait at the corner of the hallway the noises are coming from, but something’s weird; this zombie is moaning. Sure, all zombies moan, but these are some girly ass moans. You slowly round the corner and flick on you flashlight, coming to see what’s making the noises.*

She whips her head around as she sees the flashlight illuminating her, and she immediately does a running lunge at you at lightning fast speeds, wrapping her arms around your chest.
